task.title: Setting host preference
task.shortdesc: Select the host(s) you want to run your jobs during job submission.

context.p: The enhanced jobsub -m option supports setting remote host and cluster preference for individual jobs. Host preference can be set for remote hosts in any cluster.

step.cmd: Submit a job using jobsub -m cluster_name or jobsub -m host_name@cluster_name.

note.p: Cluster preference specified at job submission using jobsub -m host_name@cluster_name or jobsub -m cluster_name takes precedence over cluster preference set in SNDJOBS_TO.

example.p: In this example the submission cluster first considers cluster2, with cluster3 as the second choice.
The submission cluster first considers the cluster containing hostB, with the cluster containing hostA as the second choice.
The submission cluster first considers cluster4 , with cluster3 as the second choice.

All hosts in this example are in cluster1. The cluster selection is combined with the host preference; the submission cluster forwards the job to cluster1 with the filtered and merged host preference "others hostC+1 hostD+2".
